Package mygame.terminal

package mygame.terminal
Terminal handling

  • Class
    Description
    Option
    Utility class for handling user options in the terminal.
    Reader
    Class for reading user inputs from the terminal.
    Reader.Key
    Keys used in this program.
    TUI
    Utility class for static methods that use ANSI escape sequences to create a TUI.
    TUI.Color
    ANSI escape codes for colors.
    TUI.Color.Background
    ANSI escape codes for background colors.
